name: Alive Box Adventure
description:
After drowning it's fellows, the Alive Box is now stuck in an infinite flower-powered world which it has to traverse!

The game is controlled with Left/Right to move, Space/Z to jump, and Esc/P to pause, it's pretty primitive.

This is a small procedurally generated platformer made with Godot and TuxPaint for the 666ames Made Quick game jam.
